structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar sevgili seyirciler..." - The presenter introduces the program and welcomes viewers, marking the start of the news broadcast.

structure_sections.start_sentence: Sevgili seyirciler milli maçta gol sevincini bozkurt selamı vererek gösteren Merih Demiral'a UEFA 2 maç ceza verdi...
structure_sections.description: "Sevgili seyirciler milli maçta gol sevincini bozkurt selamı vererek gösteren Merih Demiral'a UEFA 2 maç ceza verdi..." - This section continues with the detailed news about the football player Merih Demiral and the reactions to the UEFA decision.

structure_sections.start_sentence: Ana habere bugün Türkiye'nin yüreğini yakan bir haberle başlıyoruz...
structure_sections.description: "Ana habere bugün Türkiye'nin yüreğini yakan bir haberle başlıyoruz..." - The main news content begins with a report on a tragic incident involving a Turkish soldier, followed by details about a football player's disciplinary action and reactions from various officials.
"Peki şimdi ne olacak?" - This phrase indicates a shift in focus from one news story to another, specifically transitioning from the soldier's story to the football disciplinary issue.
"Dışişleri Bakanlığı'ndan S..." - This indicates the closing remarks of the program, summarizing the news and possibly providing final thoughts or comments.
